properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECEIPT JOIN ORDER_STATE USING(ORDER_STATE_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_BUY USING(ORDER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT ON(PRODUCT_BUY.PRODUCT_NO = PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE SALE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?) AND TO_DATE(?)+0.9999 AND USER_ID = ? AND ORDER_NO = ? ORDER BY SALE_DATE

SELECT ORDER_NO , SALE_DATE , USER_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , ORDER_SUM , ORDER_STATE_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RUNM, S.* FROM (SELECT ORDER_NO , SALE_DATE , USER_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , ORDER_SUM , ORDER_STATE_NAME FROM RECEIPT JOIN ORDER_STATE USING(ORDER_STATE_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT_BUY USING(ORDER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT ON(PRODUCT_BUY.PRODUCT_NO = PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE SALE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(?) AND TO_DATE(?)+0.9999 AND USER_ID = ? AND ORDER_NO = ? ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC) S) WHERE RUNM BETWEEN ? AND ?
